    eider

    Reincarnation of SPARRA as a new bird

    Package documentation

    https://alan-turing-institute.github.io/eider/docs/

    Setting up pre-commit

    Installation is:

    pip install pre-commit   # or brew install
pre-commit install

    Once this is done, every time you commit, it will automatically run devtools::document(). If document() generated new files (i.e. if you hadn’t run document() yourself before committing), the commit will not go through: you have to manually git add the new files and then commit again.

    On this page
